caller_intent: The caller (Gary) is following up on a previous conversation regarding home insurance, seeking an update on the status of his policy.
resolution_steps: Deborah Risi confirms they are still working on the home insurance case.
She provides a timeline of resolving the matter by the end of the week.
She explains they are verifying all details before providing final numbers.
knowledge_required: Customer service protocols for follow-up communication
summary: Deborah Risi updates Gary on the status of his home insurance application, confirming they are still working on it and will provide a resolution by the end of the week after verifying all details. The conversation is professional and concludes with mutual acknowledgment.
